caption:
Tired of juggling tools for social customer care? Trust us, we get it.

That's why we're excited to announce the Sprout + Agentforce integration is now available to all Sprout customers! 

Bring social data directly into your Salesforce Service Cloud cases and enjoy: 

✅ A holistic customer view with social and CRM data
✅ Faster resolutions with automated routing and streamlined workflows
✅ Enhanced engagement through personalized responses 

Simplify support, kick back, and let tech do the heavy lifting. Learn more at the link in bio 🔗
